mapper.insert: insert into erp_business (bss_no, bss_title, bss_memo, bss_start_date, bss_end_date, bss_file_name, emp_no, manager_no) values (to_char(sysdate, 'yymm') || '2' || lpad(erp_bss_seq.nextval, 3,0), #{title}, #{memo}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{fileName}, #{empNo}, #{managerNo})
mapper.select: select bss_no as no, bss_title as title, bss_memo as memo, bss_start_date as startDate, bss_end_date as endDate, bss_file_name as fileName, bss_status as status, emp_no as empNo, manager_no as managerNo, bss_created_date as createdDate from erp_business where emp_no = #{value}
mapper.update: update erp_business set bss_title = #{title}, bss_memo = #{memo}, bss_file_name = #{fileName}, bss_status = #{status}, bss_start_date = #{startDate}, bss_end_date = #{endDate}, manager_no = #{managerNo} where bss_no = #{no}
mapper.select: select bss_no as no, bss_title as title, bss_memo as memo, bss_start_date as startDate, bss_end_date as endDate, bss_file_name as fileName, bss_status as status, emp_no as empNo, manager_no as managerNo, bss_created_date as createdDate from erp_business where bss_no = #{value}

select E.dept_no as deptNo, bss_no as no, bss_title title, bss_memo memo, bss_start_date startDate, bss_end_date endDate, bss_file_name fileName, bss_status status, E.emp_no empNo, manager_no managerNo, bss_created_date as createdDate from erp_business B, erp_employees E where B.emp_no = E.emp_no and E.dept_no = #{deptNo} and B.bss_status = #{status}
